author: 0xunclebill
content:
recently erigon implemeted a getBalanceChangesInBlock RPC endpoint (https://github.com/ledgerwatch/erigon/pull/4609)

the endpoint returns a list of addresses + balances whose balance has changed in the specified block

i'm working on adding a similar endpoint to the reth client. I was wondering if there was any interest in adding this to the official rpc api spec. from what I understand, this endpoint might not be practical for certain client implementations.

fwiw go ethereum has something similar `GetModifiedAccountsByHash (/ByBlock)` which returns a list of addresses changed in a block (only returns data for the last 128 blocks)
